section.title: Sample 2: using the SWT Simple Adder
section.para: You can start the SWT SimpleAdder using the configurations for the SimpleAdderSWT AUT. There are configurations for Windows and Linux to use the JRE installed with the ITE or your system JRE.

section.title: Sample 2: Simple Adder SWT Test
section.para: The test for the Simple Adder SWT reuses the test that uses the actions from the library of unbound modules.
